openstack_networking_trunk_v2.description: Manages a networking V2 trunk resource within OpenStack.

region.description: The region in which to obtain the V2 networking client.

name.description: A unique name for the trunk. Changing this

description.description: Human-readable description of the trunk. Changing this

port_id.description: The ID of the port to be made a subport of the trunk.

admin_state_up.description: Administrative up/down status for the trunk

tenant_id.description: The owner of the Trunk. Required if admin wants

sub_port.description: The set of ports that will be made subports of the trunk.

tags.description: A set of string tags for the port.

segmentation_type.description: The segmentation technology to use, e.g., "vlan".

segmentation_id.description: The numeric id of the subport segment.
